abstract: Nielsen’s planned $1.75 billion initial public offering will be closely watched by buyout barons, but the question is whether the new Nielsen can attract similar audience awareness from stock market investors, Breakingviews says.
snippet: Nielsen’s planned $1.75 billion initial public offering will be closely watched by buyout barons, but the question is whether the new Nielsen can attract similar audience awareness from stock market investors, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: Nielsen’s planned $1.75 billion initial public offering will be closely watched by its core demographic: buyout barons, Reuters Breakingviews says.

headline.main: An Initial Offering Will Test Nielsen
